issues.title: AI-powered code review assistant
issues.body:
## Description

Integrate AI-powered code review assistant that automatically reviews pull requests and provides intelligent feedback.

## Business Value

- Reduces code review time by 60%
- Catches common bugs and security issues automatically
- Improves code quality consistency
- Frees developers to focus on architectural reviews

## Preconditions

- AI model trained on company codebase
- API integration with OpenAI or custom model
- Pull request webhook configuration
- Review comment posting permissions

## Acceptance Criteria

**Automated Checks:**
- [ ] Code style and formatting issues
- [ ] Potential bugs and logic errors
- [ ] Security vulnerabilities (SQL injection, XSS)
- [ ] Performance anti-patterns
- [ ] Missing test coverage
- [ ] Documentation gaps

**Review Comments:**
- [ ] Posted as PR comments with line numbers
- [ ] Severity levels: critical, warning, suggestion
- [ ] Explanation and suggested fix for each issue
- [ ] Links to style guide or documentation

**Intelligence:**
- [ ] Learn from accepted/rejected suggestions
- [ ] Adapt to team coding style
- [ ] Context-aware (understands project architecture)

## User Guide

**For Developers:**
1. Create pull request as usual
2. AI assistant reviews within 2 minutes
3. Review comments appear on specific lines
4. Address critical issues before merging
5. Accept or dismiss suggestions

**For Team Leads:**
- Configure AI review rules in settings
- Set severity thresholds for blocking
- Review AI performance metrics
- Provide feedback on AI suggestions

issues.body:

- Consensus mechanism (RAFT)

## AC

- [ ] Data access and modifications
- [ ] Administrative actions
- [ ] Security events

**Blockchain Features:**

- [ ] Multi-party validation
- [ ] Timestamp verification

**Verification:**

- [ ] Chain integrity checking
- [ ] Export for regulatory audits

issues.title: Quantum-resistant encryption
issues.body:
## Summary

Implement quantum-resistant cryptographic algorithms to future-proof data security.

## Value

Protects against future quantum computing attacks. Ensures long-term data confidentiality.

## Prerequisites

- NIST-approved post-quantum algorithms
- Library support (liboqs or similar)
- Performance testing and benchmarks
- Migration plan for existing encrypted data

## Done Criteria

**Algorithms:**
- [ ] CRYSTALS-Kyber for key encapsulation
- [ ] CRYSTALS-Dilithium for digital signatures
- [ ] Hybrid mode (classical + quantum-resistant)

**Migration:**
- [ ] Gradual rollout over 6 months
- [ ] Backward compatibility during transition
- [ ] Re-encryption of critical data

**Performance:**
- [ ] Encryption overhead < 20% vs AES
- [ ] Key generation time < 100ms
- [ ] Signature verification < 10ms

issues.title: Neural search with embeddings
issues.body:
## Overview

Replace keyword-based search with semantic search using neural embeddings.

## Why

- Understands user intent, not just keywords
- Finds conceptually similar content
- Handles multi-language queries
- Better relevance than traditional search

## Setup

- Embedding model (OpenAI, Sentence-BERT)
- Vector database (Pinecone, Weaviate)
- Batch embedding generation pipeline
- Real-time embedding updates

## AC

**Semantic Search:**
- [ ] Understands synonyms and related concepts
- [ ] Cross-language search capability
- [ ] Handles typos and misspellings
- [ ] Context-aware results

**Vector Operations:**
- [ ] Generate embeddings for all content
- [ ] Similarity search with cosine distance
- [ ] Hybrid search (keyword + semantic)
- [ ] Re-ranking with ML model

**Performance:**
- [ ] Search response time < 100ms
- [ ] Support millions of vectors
- [ ] Batch embedding updates in < 1 hour
